$eref.description: LineSymbol3D is used to render features with Polyline geometry in a 3D SceneView.
$eref.title: LineSymbol3D

___symbolLayers.description: A Collection of Symbol3DLayer objects used to visualize the graphic or feature.

___type.description: Specifies the type of symbol used.

$eref.description: MeshSymbol3D is used to render 3D mesh features in a SceneLayer in a 3D SceneView.
$eref.title: MeshSymbol3D

___symbolLayers.description: A Collection of Symbol3DLayer objects used to visualize the graphic or feature.

___type.description: Specifies the type of symbol used

examples.title: Icon Point Symbol with verticalOffset and leader line callout

$eref.description: PointSymbol3D is used to render features with Point geometry in a 3D SceneView.
$eref.title: PointSymbol3D

___symbolLayers.description: A Collection of Symbol3DLayer objects used to visualize the graphic or feature.

___type.description: Specifies the type of symbol used

$eref.description: PolygonSymbol3D is used to render features with Polygon geometry in a 3D SceneView. Polygon features may also be rendered as points with icons or objects at the centroid of each polygon.
$eref.title: PolygonSymbol3D

___symbolLayers.description: A Collection of Symbol3DLayer objects used to visualize the graphic or feature.

___type.description: Specifies the type of symbol used.

$eref.description: The StyleSymbolReference is used to reference a symbol from a portal styleItem
$eref.title: StyleSymbolReference

___name.description: Identifies a symbol in the style by name.

___styleName.description: A registered web style name, such as `EsriThematicTreesStyle`

description: Symbol3D is the base class for all 3D symbols. It is used to render 2D Point, Polyline, and Polygon features in a FeatureLayer and 3D mesh features in a SceneLayer. All 3D symbols must be used in a SceneView instance; there is no support for 3D rendering in MapViews.
title: Symbol3D
